documents.document:
Marrige Time

Marriage is a holy word in people's eyes. The true meaning of marriage contains so much. It not only means two persons love for each other, but also means the whole life to be together. No matter who you are or no matter which gender you are, marriage is very important under any circumstances.Maybe many young men are bothered by a question, and that is how to proposal to his sweetheart. Proposal is very crucial to some degree because usually girls think a lot of it. Some romantic way to propose are frequently appear in films or newspaper, which makes young ladies fall into dreaming proposal imagination. So men should pay much attention to their proposal. Maybe a special creative proposal can help them success.Apart from proposal,planning a wedding is also important. You know ,weddings are sure to be special moments for bridal. In the wedding day, bride is always called the most beautiful lady. Brides usually treat the day as the most important day in her lifetime. Young lady pay attention to what they wear and how the wedding hold.Generally speaking, wedding is special occasion for both brides and guests. Girls dress up to show their charm in the wedding party. Special occasion dresses for girls play powerful role at this moment. Every girl want to be the focus among people, but the bride is always queen of the party this time.

Perfect Wedding

Every girl wants to have a perfect wedding. However, perfect wedding is so hard for us to hold. There are thousands of details must be taken into consideration. Planing a wedding is very complicated. Now let's learn about how planning a wedding. Here are some points we should pay attention to when preparing for a wedding.1.When to hold wedding partyThis question is worthy to be thought carefully. Wedding day should avoid lady's menstrual period, bridegroom must pay attention to it. What's more, arrangement of every side should be taken into consideration, so perhaps putting wedding day on holidays is appropriate.2.Where to hold wedding partyExcept for area and price, food and service quality, environment are all ought to be taken into account. Transportation of wedding party spot should be convenient, and it would be best to be near a metro station, a bus stop or a parking lot.3.Taking wedding photosTaking wedding photos is quite important to brides. If you choose to rent wedding dresses, you'd better know the price and quality of different commercial tenant in advance. If you choose buy wedding dresses, you can buy wedding dress online. After the wedding, wedding dress may be stored up as a souvenir.4.Entertaining guestsBefore the wedding party, both bride and bridegroom must know about their guests, otherwise embarrassing situation may happen.Wedding are special moments for bridal, so you can never be too careful to prepare for it. It's a new start for the newlywed which is significant to their whole life. Maybe a perfect wedding brings a perfect future.

Tips about Wearing Winter Wedding Dresses

It's winter days this time. Wedding in winter sounds always romantic. It reminds us of white snow which symbolizes purity and innocence. Getting married in winter is not bad, is it? Since it is relatively much more cold, buying wedding dresses with sleeves is necessary for women loving beauty.Planing a wedding in winter maybe not easy, though it seems to be fantasy to hold a wedding in winter. Keeping warm become very important in these days. As it's special moments for bridal, perhaps most ladies are thinking about how to dress warm and beautiful. Wedding dresses with long sleeves can reveal the bride's mature elegant appeal. In addition to this, brides or bridesmaid may as well choose dresses made of thicker fabrics such as satin or taffeta.Also, brides can pick out some accessories to keep warm. For example, shawl made of fur can help bride keep warm , and it highlights the grace and elegance of brides. A coat with a strapless wedding dress is useful and nice as well. Apart from this, brides should pay attention to keep their hands and arms warm. Long gloves are quite suitable.Even in winter,ladies can wear their favourite wedding dresses to show their charming figure and skin.As long as you take my advice above, it's easy to be a nice bride in winter!

How to Proposal in An Appropriate Way

There's no one way of proposal is bound to succeed, but you can never stop propose because of being afraid of fail. How to proposal to decrease the possibility of fail in proposal is a question troubling many people. Now we offer some aspects should be paid attention to.
Date of proposal
Choosing which date to make a proposal is restricted by many factors. Special date may make great difference. You can choose the date in which you first kissed her or your first dating day, and her birthday or her favourite day in a week is also okay.
Items used for proposal
Traditional items for proposal is a diamond ring, but considering your economic capabilities, you can also choose other items. It's not necessary for you to buy a diamond ring if you cannot afford. Anything which represents your heart is all right, even special occasion dresses for girls are acceptable.
Declaration for proposal
Your declaration and behavior should correspond with lady's personality. If she is a quiet girl, you can take her to the place which you are familiar with, such as a park or a restaurant where you frequently go. If she is an outgoing girl, you may as well make the declaration for proposal in family party or KTV.
Proposal is one important part in planing a wedding, so a good proposal may be a good start for your new life. If you have enough confidence in spending your whole life with her, don't hesitate!

Terrific Proposal

One can deal with other's affairs calmly, but when it comes to himself, he will lose his head.
A friend of mine,one clever young man who has been a manager of a big company, recently turns to me for help. He has be together with his girlfriend for five years and now he believes it's time for marriage, so he has been thinking about how to proposal for a long time. He told me that he wanted to give his girlfriend a surprise and it must be a sweet and romantic proposal. I replied him that planing a perfect proposal was no easier than planing a wedding, but I gave him some ideas at last. I think the ideas may be helpful for many people, so I share with you all now.
Make a video
It's a good idea to make a video which records your sweet past days and also records your proposal for her. If possible, you can accompany her to watch the video. She must be moved by you.
Make use of e-mail
We are living in the internet age, so you can try to send a love e-mail to her for proposal?but the premise is your e-mail must be unique and fantastic.
Surprise in cinema
If possible, you accompany your girlfriend to see a film in the cinema and before the beginning of the film, on the screen appears a line of words saying that Alice (her name), would you marry me? I bet that she will be touched and accept your proposal without hesitation.
Make wedding photography
You see, your girl friend hasn't had a wedding photograph. You can use some softwares like photoshop to make a serious of wedding photos for her. When she see herself wearing wedding dresses with sleeves or strapless wedding dresses in the photos, she will be surprised and excited. On the back of each photograph, you can write your proposal words. That's OK.
I hope that my ideas will help him and I wish they have a future of happiness.

A Group Marriage Ceremony

Have you ever heard a group marriage ceremony? It's not a newborn thing. Instead, it has a long history. Half of a century ago, a hundred couples from France got together in Mallorca, the largest island in Balearic Islands of Spain, to get married. Since then on, the beautiful island has been called "Honeymoon Isle".
If you are thinking about how to plan a wedding, why not try a group marriage ceremony? A group wedding not only can save time and strength, but also can avoid embarrassing and awkward occasions. Generally speaking, a group wedding will attract many couples to attend, which makes the group wedding a big event. As a result, a group wedding must be romantic and receive a lot of wishes. It must be a special moment for bridal and it's believed that with so many wishes and witnesses, your life after marriage will be colorful and happy.
Usually, couples will ask others to record their weddings from beginning to end. I used to see a video about a group wedding on the internet, and it's fantastic to see so many couples getting married together. The whole world can see their beautiful faces and wedding dresses online. I have to say that it's a good idea to hold a group marriage ceremony.

How To Politely Decline a Marriage Proposal

Too many people are troubled with how to proposal while perhaps a majority of people are trapped in the condition how to decline a marriage proposal at the same time. The fairytale suggests that "yes, oh, yes!" is the only answer to ever give to a proposal of marriage. In the ending of the story, princess is always happy living with prince forever, but the reality is girls are wondering wether he is Mr right.

Marriage proposal is the first step of planning a wedding, so it's may be the crucial process. If you don't want to get married with him or you are still hesitating now, you mustn't give him a positive response. Instead of saying yes to please men, you had better give a clear answer right now.

If you don't want your refusion hurt your friendship, you can tell him that you will not consider marriage in recent days. Or you can say you are too young to settle down now. In addition, you tell him that you fall in love with someone else and if it's true, maybe this is a best excuse and reason.

Every girl want to be the most beautiful bride and the pre-condition is that you will get married with the one you love. To be the most pretty bride, just click here: http://www.dressmepretty.co.nz/54-wedding-dresses-with-sleeves

Wedding Dress for Pregnant Ladies

Are you getting ready for marriage? You must have to say yes and one important factor is that you are pregnant. For those who have been pregnant for several months, body figure is their biggest problem. It's so cruel to deprive a young lady's right to be a pretty bride just because she is pregnant. So here we also have maternity wedding dresses to let brides dream come true to be a beautiful bride.

What's crucial to choose maternity wedding dress? It's simple in fact. You may pay attention to fashion trend of the year and you may be fond of Zuhair Murad Fall 2012 wedding dresses. Now let me tell you the truth. Fashion trend is not so important to you. A pregnant just need to choose a suitable and beautiful empire style wedding dress. You can decide your waist height according to your pregnant period.

You needn't worry about your body figure at all now. Just choose your dream wedding dress according to my advice above and prepare some pure white wedding flowers, and I'm sure you will be satisfied with your perfect wedding!

Colors for Wedding

When it comes to a wedding, what first comes into your mind? Most people think of white wedding dresses, green grassland and colorful flowers. Yes, colors are filled with the whole wedding. Some people like to follow fashion masters such as Victoria Kyriakides and learn about Victoria Kyriakides 2013 wedding dresses. It's a good idea to arrange for your wedding. On the other hand, if you just decide the main color and select some suitable colors to match, that's also very nice.

One important element you must take into account is the color of wedding dresses. Whether a line wedding dresses or wedding dress with sleeves, they must choose themselves one or more colours. The most ordinary but classic color is white. No matter what's the main color of you wedding, white wedding dresses are all right choice. However, if the dominant tone is light color, maybe you can choose bright color for your dress. On the contrast, if the dominant tone is dark, you can choose suitable light color for wedding dress.

Considering the other decorations such as wedding flowers. The main principle to choose colors is that it must be harmonious with the dominate tone. What's more, if your wedding dress is in white, you'd better choose some other colour flowers and you can choose white wedding flowers when the dress is coloured.

Wearing A Vintage Wedding Dress on Cold Days

As the weather getting cold day after day, young ladies who are busy with preparing her wedding may bothered with the wedding style. On cold days, sexy and attractive strapless or short wedding dresses seem to be not the right choice. Then wedding dress with sleeves can give you a hand to solve the problem.
If you have already seen the pictures of girls in vintage wedding dresses with sleeves, you must be convinced by its elegance. Vintage wedding dresses gives people a impression of past royal costumes.Complicated palace retro style wedding dresses use delicate layers of white organza to increase the sense of three-dimension, adding a little romance, showing a demure and elegant bride. Full length dress with pattern embroidery, flying asymmetrical flowers shows the thick rustic rural atmosphere. Different vintage wedding dresses show quite different fashion style.
Wearing such fabulous wedding dress to the ceremony, is there something we still need? Wedding cake! If you like, I suggest an ombre wedding cake. An ombre wedding cake tastes delicious and looks good, harmonious with the whole vintage style decoration. It must be a wonderful wedding!

One-shoulder Bridesmaid Dresses for The Perfect Wedding

There's no doubt that the bride is the focus of the wedding day, and no one can and should steal the light, but that not means the bridemaids are not important. On the contrast, bridesmaids are especially important because they represent the wedding to some degree and they must help to let the bride stand out. As a result, choosing a suitable bridesmaid dress is quite significant. Here we suggest a one-shoulder bridesmaid dress for you.
As what I have said, the bride is the heart of the whole wedding. When choosing bridesmaid dress, you must make sure that the dress is perfectly with the wedding dress. In addition, the bridesmaid dress should also be pretty and fashionable. One-shoulder bridesmaid dresses will make bridesmaid seem a little sexy rather than over-exposed, and this style give people an impression of being lively which will not have any negative effects on the bride's clothing.
You can never put bridesmaid dresses a low position, otherwise that will impact your whole wedding unexpectedly. 2012 spring free shipping wedding dresses now are prevailing. You can consider a right bridesmaid dress when choosing the wedding dress, which will save your shipping fee at the same time.

World Top Wedding Dress Designer--Yumi Katsura

Yumi Katsura, famous Japan costume designer, the pioneer of Japanese wedding dress fashion industry, devoted her whole life to wedding couture. Now you can see 2012 spring free shipping wedding dresses on the internet, at the same time, you can also appreciate the works of the master.

Yumi Katsura has always shown an insatiable spirit of inquiry into new materials and an unrelenting pursuit of new techniques. Starting in 1964, she launched dresses in a wide range of materials, developing many silk and lace fabrics into leading choices for Japanese bridal fashion.In 45 years of wedding dress design career, Yumi Katsura has been devoted to expanding the wedding dress innovation. The European celebrity association awarded the "fashion achievement award" to her for her outstanding devotion. Since 2003, "Yumi Katsura Paris" every year is the world's only qualify in the top event, the fashion industry senior custom fashion show in Paris (Haute Couture) release advanced order uniform ten several brands.

Traditional wedding dress or modern one-shoulder bridesmaid dresses all can be found in her design which are worth seeing.

Put The Bridesmaid Dress Together with Wedding Dress

As we all know, bride is the focus of the whole wedding, but it can never be a perfect wedding without those brilliant bridesmaid. However, a majority of people will separate wedding dresses from bridesmaid dresses. In fact, we can put the two part together when considering the selection of bridesmaid dresses.

2012 spring free shipping wedding dresses are popular in recent days, when choosing one dreamy wedding dress online, you might as well browse for some bridesmaid dresses to collocate the wedding dress. Bridesmaid dresses should be a little low-key and harmonious with the wedding dress. As a result, a light-colored wedding dress with pale pink, purple or white bridesmaid dress is quite right. It's all right to collocate a bright-colored wedding dress with bold bright green, red bridesmaid dress. Of course the color tones should be taken into consideration.

Besides, bridesmaid dresses are better to be simple. One-shoulder bridesmaid dresses with no redundant decorations are good choice. Usually several bridemaid worn simple style dress can form a nice dreamy effect.

Prepare A Dreamy Wedding Dress in Spring

If your boyfriend has already overcome the difficulties in making a marriage proposal, are you preparing a satisfactory wedding dress for your wedding? Summer wedding is always popular for its good weather and beautiful scenery outside. As a result, is the 2012 spring free shipping wedding dress attractive to you now?

Summer follows spring so tightly that it's a good season to prepare for your wedding in spring. Just look around, thousands of wedding dresses make your eyes confused. Faced with so many choices, what should you do? First , consider your body shape and skin tone. Remember that not all the beautiful wedding dresses worn beautiful in everyone. Make sure the style and color have positive effects on your figure and skin tone. For example, a bridesmaid who has a thin and good-looking arms would like one-shoulder bridesmaid dresses or strapless bridesmaid dresses rather than the one with long sleeves. This is also true of wedding dress. In a word, the principle is that the dress must show your advantage and cover your disadvantages.

Spring and summer is exuberant time, so if you don't mind, you can choose a bright color wedding dress which is prominent. While there are spring free shipping wedding dresses 2012, take the chance to buy a dreamy one.

Pink Wedding Dress

Planning a wedding can be both exciting and stressful and one important thing which most brides are interested in and would like to spend much time on is choosing a beautiful wedding dress. Looking forward to the summer wedding , you can consider the 2012 spring free shipping wedding dresses now. Among thousands of bridal gowns, many are white and now the color pink is popular, have you thought about wearing a pink wedding dress?
In fact, some brides will raise an eyebrow at the mention of a pink wedding dress because the pink dress always remind people of barbie doll and that's not the effect any bride wants. They may treat pink as a color at most can be used in the bridesmaid dress. Yes, pink is widely used in bridesmaid dresses, and you can see pink one-shoulder bridesmaid dresses, pink strapless bridesmaid dresses, pink V-neck bridesmaid dresses. However, pink wedding dresses is not the name of childish or lovely. Instead, you can find some designer wedding dresses in pink which are both elegant and mature.
In general, the spirit of pink is more casual, making it an ideal choice for a spring or summer wedding. Face with lots of 2012 spring free shipping wedding dresses, why not try the pink one? Be a pink lady in your wedding, that would be fine.

Purple Wedding Dress Taking You into Medieval Times

In ascent times, the color purple was the symbol of royalty and meditation. It's probably that you have never take this color into consideration when you choose a wedding dress. As a matter of fact, purple is an extremely popular color for weddings. From dresses to flowers there is a purple that flatters everyone. Look at 2012 spring free shipping wedding dresses and you'll find there are more than a few purple wedding dresses.

Unlike red or pink, purple gives people a feeling of calm and silence rather than enthusiasm or warm. Some bridesmaid like the light purple dress and the one-shoulder bridesmaid dresses in purple are really pretty. However, purple bridal gowns have great visual impact and look more elegant. If you are a gentle and quite girl, this color is proper for you. Besides, if you want to give others an impression of being sophisticated and elegant, then you can also take it into account.

Purple and green wedding dresses were common in medieval times, particularly among the wealthy, as the colors represented royalty and power. Now you can wear a purple wedding dress which brings the vintage design feeling. A unique purple wedding dress must be the shining star of 2012 spring free shipping wedding dresses.

The Magic Power of One-shoulder Dresses

Since the one-shoulder style is born, it has won a good reputation and enjoyed great popularity among a variety of people. Now the one-shoulder design is frequently used in wedding clothing including one-shoulder bridesmaid dresses and one-shoulder wedding dresses.

Why are so many people fond of the one-shoulder style? What makes the one shoulder dress style so unique is the neckline. Unlike the traditional design, the neckline that crosses the body diagonally provides a sexy appeal, without showing too much skin; this is a happy balance. The asymmetrical design also shows a different chic which will always leave people a deep impression. Among the 2012 spring free shipping wedding dresses, one-shoulder design is always one of the best sellers.Many famous stars also like the design. One-shoulder dresses which are immensely popular with international celebrities such as reality show star Kim Kardashian, model Heidi Klum and actress Charlize Theron have successfully made their way into the Indian fashion circles.

Some dresses with two straps will make us feel dull or even childish because our eyes have been customed to this design, and most people think the symmetrical design is natural without any creative ideas. However, the one-shoulder bridesmaid dresses with floral or other embellishment at the one shoulder will give us a new look.

Prom Dresses, Evening Dresses And Cocktail Dresses

Young people are nearly fond of all kinds of parties and ladies are always thinking craefully about the dresses for parties. The dress must be pretty enough to show their body shapes and personality, and it should also be suitable for the occasions. As a result, let's see the definition and differences among prom dresses, evening dresses and cocktail dresses.
In the United States prom (short for promenade) is a formal (black tie) dance or gathering of high school students. It is typically held near the end of the senior year. As for the prom dress, boys usually dress in black or white formal wear, regardless of the time of the event, sometimes paired with brightly colored ties or bow ties with vests, in some cases in colors matching their date's dress.Girls wear traditional ladies dresses or gowns and wear ladies' jewellery such as earrings and a necklace.
Evening dress is a household word. An evening gown is a long flowing women's dress usually worn to a semi-formal or formal affair. Men usually wear a dinner jacket and black tie, and women would like to wear a floor-length gown.
A cocktail party is a party at which cocktails are served. It is sometimes called a cocktail reception. In most cases, the cocktail party is a semi-formal party, so ladies will choose some fashionable style dresses to it. Cocktail dresses can be a full-length formal gown, and it also can be a short one. The typical style cocktail dress is the little black dress. It is a sheath cocktail dress which is widely used in casual parties, being popular among people for years.

Hot-Selling One-Shoulder Bridesmaid Dress

Do you want to pull some others some people's little brown eyes and appear specific throughout marriage ceremony? If that s so, why not try one shoulder bridesmaid dresses?
As we all know, there's only one bride, but there can be more than a few brides and they will have to wear the same clothes in most cases. As a result, a bridesmaid want to ingratiate herself with the other bridesmaids, there's one thing she can do -- a select a bridesmaid dress that they can essentially wear again! Here we suggest a one-shoulder bridesmaid dress. One shoulder bridesmaid dresses are fashioned to offer a stylish, yet sexy look. They may be the latest form of gown which is taking over the fashion world. One-shoulder bridesmaid dress can perfectly reflect the temperament of ladies, unlike those V-neck bridesmaid dresses and strapless bridesmaid dresses. Everyone can wear an A-line Bridesmaid Dress, but not all for One-shoulder Bridesmaid Dress.
You can see that choosing a bridesmaid dress is as difficult as selecting a wedding dress. Perhaps we can read fashion magazines, watch fashion shows to know the latest fashion trend. 2012 spring free shipping wedding dresses are on sale on and we can go for one piece.

Mori Lee Designs

Have you ever heard Mori Lee ? It's such a famous brand in wedding gown aspect and the designer Madeline Gardner now is also well known to people. Of all her designs, the one-shoulder bridesmaid dresses are well worth seeing for the unique style and fabric collocation.

For over 17 years, Madeline Gardner has been designing dresses for Mori Lee. From her childhood days growing up in New Jersey, hemming and designing clothing has been a part of her life.After graduating from The Fashion Institute of New York City, her goals of becoming a true designer took shape. Still a Jersey girl, she lives with her husband and two sons across the river from her So Ho studio. Now her 2012 spring free shipping wedding dresses are hot selling. If you want to see the master's workpiece, just come to buy one piece.

Just as what I have said, her one-shoulder bridesmaid dresses are especially outstanding this season so that many brides and bridesmaids choose this brand as the one accompany them to pass the big day of their life?

Find Fashion in Your Wardrobe

It seems that nobody knows where the fashion trend goes. Some style you think is out-dated for a long time perhaps suddenly to be a fashionable trend. As a result, when you go to your wardrobe for a suitable party dress for girls, some old dress is not necessary a bad choice. Don't consider it ridiculous. Miracle will happen!

Browsing the website to see 2012 spring free shipping wedding dresses, have you found something so familiar? You can see lace applique bridal gowns going popular these days. Then it's probably you also have a lace dress which you haven't worn for long, and now you can pick it up again to use it. If you are still not satisfied with it, just make a little modification.

After thinking so, you will never be confused with buying a one-shoulder bridesmaid dress or lace cocktail dress. Come on and do by yourself, you will find your wardrobe has so many good clothes. Different collocation can also make a big difference. You can change your dress length or embellishment, also, you can choose a short skirt instead of long trousers to collocate a sweater.

Good Ideas about Prom Dress

Before attending the prom, you try on one piece after one piece, and you still hesitate which one is the best one. Yes. Many girls are faced with the same question because every girl want to be the moon surrounded by stars. Party dresses for women are so numerous that you can hardly decide which one is the best.

I believe that becoming the prom queen is a dream for all girls. It means that you are beautiful and popular. To make that dream come true, you have to do a lot of preparation. Have you seen the prom dresses on sale? Go for a special one! What is special? This is totally based on your feeling. As a result, you can pay attention to the latest popular trend and follow it. However, you must use your mind because not all the fashion trend means fashion in you. The dress style must be appropriate, fitting you.

If you are a young lively girl, and you want others to treat you as a popular lovely princess, you can choose pink or other bright color short prom dresses with lace applique. If you want to show your elegant and calm aspect to the public, you might as well wear the black dress or sequins dress with slit or open back.

Wearing A White Bridesmaid Dress to Wedding

As we all know, traditional wedding dresses are most in white colour because white is the symbol of purity and faith. As for bridesmaid dresses, they are usually in pink, light purple or some other light tender colors. As a matter of fact, white is also a good choice both in party dresses for women and bridesmaid dresses.

Why white is also an appropriate color for bridesmaid gowns? First, it's the same reason why traditional bridal gowns choose white as main color, because its meaning is very good. Second, if the bride wear a white wedding dress, just as 2012 spring free shipping wedding dresses, then bridesmaid wearing white dress together with the bride will look like white clouds, giving a fabulous overall feeling. However, if the bride select a red , orange or even black bridal gown, then bridesmaid wearing white dresses will make the bride much more outstanding, and that is also very dreamy effect. Besides, white dress is suitable for women at all ages so that each bridesmaid will agree to wear a white bridesmaid dress.

Bridesmaids wearing white one-shoulder bridesmaid dresses together with hand in beautiful flowers must be a charming scenery. As a result, when planning a wedding or preparing to buy bridesmaid dresses, you might as well take the white one into consideration.

Attractive V-neck Bridesmaid Dresses

Want a sexy and decent bridesmaid dress for the crucial day? Which style do you prefer? If you concentrate on the sexy element, then the open-back, slit, short or V-neck style should be appropriate choice for you. If you only focus on the elegant style, perhaps the long bridesmaid dress or some simple styles are better. Among so many styles of bridesmaid dresses and 2012 spring free shipping wedding dresses, V-neck style is always very outstanding, so it's quite popular.

To make a wise and secure decision, v-neck bridesmaid dress is a fantastic one that you canâ€™t miss. A bridesmaid is a young lady who is a sister or a friend of a bride-to-be. Therefore, short or floor-length bridesmaid dresses are the gorgeous and curvy ones and are available in attractive color combinations. Chiffon, net, polyester, satin and silk are the lavish materials which give a stunner look to the figure. One-shoulder bridesmaid dresses are also not bad.

Take only a glimpse at the present bridal wear arena, lots of chic V-neck bridesmaid dresses quickly sprung out. It is absolutely a new force in the fashion industry and also on modern nuptials. The largest advantage of V-neck style is that its neckline can enhance your lines at bust.
